attributes.action: abolish all roaming charges between the UK mainland and all relevant islands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to see all roaming charges between the UK mainland and the following locations abolished:

Isle of Man
Jersey
Guernsey
Any other Great Britain island not mentioned above

I understand that o2 have already abolished charges between the mainland and Northern Ireland

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
